title: The Ascension
creation_date: 19th century in the style of 16th century
credit_line: Gift of Mr. and Mrs. George L. Craig, Jr. in memory of Mr. and Mrs. George Hann
provenance_text:
Antiquariat, 1935-invoice no., r12115; George R. Hann; (Hann sale, Christie, Manson & Woods International, Inc., 17 April 1980, lot 27); Mr. and Mrs. George L. Craig, Jr. [1]; gift to Museum, October 1980.

Notes:
[1]. George L. Craig Jr., c. 1898-1984; wife Kathleen Casey, 1901-1988, Sewickley Heights, PA.

Under review by CGK.
